object.field:
## About Illius Rock is a movement to bring musicians and their fans together. ###{@class=about-page} Our mission:
#### For Musicians... We provide a framework for engaging your fans, raising money for projects, and empowering your fan base. We believe music lovers will support artists directly and that there are better ways of reaching out to music lovers than album sales and t-shirts. Find out more about what our [campaigns](/campaign/list/) can do for you.
#### For Fans... We know you want to help your favorite musicians and bands. Illius Rock enables you to contribute directly to them, gain exclusive access, and get involved in their success. Check out our [campaigns](/campaign/list/) and help support your favorite artists.

## Contact
### help@illiusrock.com General help
### campaigns@illiusrock.com "What's a campaign?" "Can I offer this in my campaign?" "I've got an awesome idea for a campaign!"
### feedback@illiusrock.com We love feedback!
### press@illiusrock.com Press inquiries
### privacy@illiusrock.com Questions about privacy and terms of use policy

## What are campaign tickets?
We love going to shows. They're the perfect opportunity to promote your campaign and accept contributions, so we made it easy.
Campaigns tickets allow your fans to quickly contribute to your campaigns. In exchange for their contribution, they receive a ticket that directs them to IlliusRock.com. Each ticket has a unique code on it that acknowledges them as a contributor to your campaign.
### I don't get it?
Here's a handy 3 step breakdown:
1. Request campaign tickets. 2. Accept contributions. 3. Hand out a campaign ticket for each contribution.
### What if the fan is not a registered on Illius Rock? Can they still contribute?
Yes, they'll be asked to create an account after they enter their unique code on our website.
### Why is there a maximum on the amount of tickets I can request?
Your campaigns have a limited number of spots, so the maximum number of tickets you can request is limited to the maximum number of spots available in your campaign.
### How many campaign tickets should I request?
That's up to you, but we'd recommend enough to meet demand at live shows but still leave some left over for fans that want to contribute online.
### If I request the maximum number of tickets, what happens to my campaign?
The number of tickets you request will be automatically deducted from the total available campaign spots. This ensures that everyone that receives a ticket will have an open spot in your campaign. Unfortunately, anyone that goes to your campaign page will be told that online contributions are unavailable, and will be directed to contact you.
### I requested campaign tickets; what next?
You should receive campaign tickets 5-7 days after they are requested. They are mailed to the band address we have on file for you. Once received, you can immediately start accepting contributions in exchange for tickets.
**Still have questions? E-mail us: help@illiusrock.com**

## What are campaign tickets?
We love going to live shows, and think they're a great venue for artists to show you why you should contribute to their campaigns. If an artist has an ongoing campaign on IlliusRock.com, they can accept your contributions at their live shows. In exchange for your contribution, you'll receive a campaign ticket with a unique code that you can enter above. Once entered, it will acknowledge your contribution to the artist's campaign and qualify you for the campaign offering.
Still have questions? E-mail us at help@illiusrock.com

## Register!
Signing up is free. You'll need a Paypal Business/Premier account and/or a Google Checkout account to accept contributions, and you can create both during registration.
{@class=button} [Create an Artist Account](/artist/register/?next=/artist/)
### Create a campaign
Campaigns let you engage your fans, promote yourself and raise money for interesting projects.
Answer these questions: - What are you trying to raise money for? - What can you offer your fans for their contributions?
#### Examples: Got an awesome idea for a music video but don't have the cast, crew or money to make it happen? Share your idea with yours fans, let them contribute to the concept and take part in the video.
Need to raise money to record a new album? You can use Illius Rock to attract contributions, and offer your fans:
* advance or signed copies of the album * private, listening parties * invitations to the recording sessions, or to the album release party * shout outs in the album liner notes
Campaigns can be free! You decide how much fans can contribute to your campaign. The only fees are based on a small percentage of the money you raise in your campaign.
### Raise Money
Once your campaign is approved, you'll be able to accept fan contributions directly. This money goes directly into your Paypal or Google Checkout account and can be transferred to a regular bank account for free.
### Engage
Illius Rock aims to bring you together with your fans. Use your contributions to fund new projects, like expanded tours, new equipment, music videos and give your fans exclusive access. Stay in touch with these fans whenever you launch a campaign.
### Communicate
Fans that contribute to a campaign can be notified of new campaigns.
Still have questions? [Check out our FAQ.](/help/artist/faq/)
{@class=button} [Create an Artist Account](/artist/register/?next=/artist/)

### FAQ #### What are the fees associated with using PayPal? PayPal charges 2.9% + 30 cents for each contribution. When fans contribute $10, PayPal eats 69 cents of that. Not too shabby, eh? If you receive a $1 contribution, PayPal eats 33 cents of that. View detailed pricing info at PayPal. #### Do I need to verify my PayPal account? In order to transfer money into a bank account, you will need to verify that bank account with PayPal.

There are no setup or monthly fees for Illius Rock or Paypal. Click here to sign up for a PayPal Premier or Business account. - Use Paypal Premier if only one person needs to access this PayPal account. - Use Paypal Business if multiple people need to manage this PayPal account. Already have a PayPal account? Click here to upgrade to Premier or Business.

### FAQ #### What are the fees associated with using Google Checkout? Google Checkout charges 2% + 20 cents for each contribution. When fans contribute $10, Google eats 40 cents of that. Not too shabby, eh? If you receive a $1 contribution, Google eats 22 cents of that. View detailed fee structure at Google Checkout. #### Should I configure anything else with Google Checkout? Once your Google Checkout account is created, we recommend filling out your Google Checkout profile to include things like your contact info, etc. #### Do I need to verify my Google Checkout account? In order to transfer money into a bank account, you will need to verify that bank account with Google.

Sign up for a Google Checkout account here. Once signed up, you'll need to configure your Google Checkout account and find your Merchant ID and Key: 1. On your Google Checkout account page, click on Settings. If you can't find Settings, look for "My Sales" at the top. 2. On the Settings page, select Preferences from the left. 3. Under Order Processing, change the setting to: "Automatically authorize and **charge** the buyer’s credit card." 4. If “Email me each time I receive an order, cancellation, or other transaction” is checked, you'll be notified for every contribution. (Recommended) 5. Click on Integration on the left. 6. Uncheck "My company will only host digitally signed carts." 7. In the API callback URL field, enter: https://illiusrock.com/campaign/google-notification/ 8. Set the Callback method to HTML. 9. On the right side, you should see your Google Merchant ID and Key. Copy these values into the fields below.

## help support your favorite artists Welcome to Illius Rock. We enable artists to take on interesting new projects, while reaching out to you, their fanbase. Check out our *CAMPAIGNS* to see how you can contribute and stay tuned for news of our upcoming **launch party**.

## ILLIUS ROCK, INC.
### TERMS OF USE AGREEMENT
This Terms of Use Agreement (“Agreement”) is legally binding between you and Illius Rock, Inc. (“Illius Rock”), and sets forth the terms for your use of the Illius Rock website (the “Site”). The Site is the provider of the mechanism (the “Service”) that permits Users to create fundraising campaigns (“Campaigns”) and to make and accept monetary contributions (“Contributions”), under certain terms and conditions as set forth in this Agreement. By using the Service, you agree to be bound by this Agreement, whether you are a “Member” (which means that you have registered with the Service) or you are a “Visitor” (which means you have not registered with the Service). The term “User” refers to a Visitor or a Member. You are only authorized to use the Service (regardless of whether your access or use is intended) if you agree to abide by all applicable laws and to this Agreement.
This Agreement includes the policy for acceptable use of the Service, your rights, obligations and restrictions regarding your use of the Service, and the Illius Rock Privacy Policy.
You may receive a copy of this Agreement by emailing us at: **privacy@illiusrock.com**, Subject: Terms of Use Agreement.
**Modification of Terms**. Illius Rock reserves the right, update, revise, or otherwise modify this Agreement from time to time and to impose new or additional rules, policies, terms, or conditions on your use of the Service. Such updates, revisions, supplements, modifications, and additional rules, policies, terms, and conditions (collectively referred to in this Agreement as “Additional Terms”) will be effective immediately and incorporated into this Agreement. All Additional Terms are hereby incorporated into this Agreement by this reference. Illius Rock will inform you as to any such changes, and your continued use of the Site will be deemed to constitute your acceptance of any and all such Additional Terms.
**Registration Information**. You are entirely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your Service registration information, including the user name and password. You agree not to use the account, user name, or password of another Member at any time without authorization, or to disclose your password to any third party. You agree to notify Illius Rock immediately if you suspect any unauthorized use of your account or access to your password. You are solely responsible for any and all use of your account.
{@id=privacy-policy} **Personal Information and Security**. You agree to provide true, accurate, current and complete information about yourself, including verifying that you are thirteen (13) years or older, as prompted by the registration process (such information being the “Registration Information”). By using the Service, you represent and warrant that (i) all registration information you submit is truthful and accurate, (ii) you will maintain the accuracy of such information, and (iii) you are 13 years of age or older. During the registration process to use the Service, you will create a password and a user name. Once you have completed the registration process, Illius Rock will set up an account for you. You are solely and entirely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and user name. Furthermore, you are solely and entirely responsible for any and all activities that occur under your account.
You agree that Illius Rock may use your personal information, including without limitation, to: (i) Deliver to you Illius Rock’s Service, and to communicate with you, including concerning your account and customer service issues. This may include verifying authorization of credit card usage before any Contribution; (ii) determine if you meet the minimum system requirements to use the Site; (iii) track Contributions for the purpose of paying third parties; (iv) ask you to participate in surveys about music, services, news and events; (v) provide you with content, services, instructions, and a more personalized experience based on personal information, such as your zip/postal code and any content or other preferences you provide; and (vi) provide you with news, free newsletters, updates, targeted advertising, promotions and other related offers.
Illius Rock does not knowingly use your personal information for purposes incompatible with those listed above. However, you acknowledge and agree that Illius Rock may sell, rent, or share your non-personally-identifiable information to a third party. The third party’s use of such information is governed by the privacy policy of the third party and Illius Rock’s use is governed by Illius Rock’s privacy policy. By your use of the Service, you expressly agree that Illius Rock is not liable to you, or responsible for, the alleged improper or misuse by any such third party of this non-personally-identifiable information. Illius Rock also may disclose relevant information about Illius Rock’s customers to its contractors in order for the contractors to provide specific services for Illius Rock. Illius Rock’s contractors are bound by strict contractual requirements to keep all personal information they process strictly confidential and to use such information solely on behalf of Illius Rock.
Illius Rock may disclose your personal information if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to: (i) confirm to the edicts of the law; (ii) comply with the order of a competent judicial authority in any jurisdiction; (iii) comply with legal process served on Illius Rock; (iv) protect and defend the rights or property of Illius Rock; or (v) act in urgent circumstances to protect the personal safety of users of the Site, the Service, or the public at large.
#### Acknowledgement of Ownership.
*Illius Rock Content*. The Service contains proprietary information and material, including but not limited to graphics, audio clips, and editorial content (“Illius Rock Content”), that is owned by Illius Rock and/or its licensors, and that is protected by copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret and other laws. Illius Rock and/or its licensors own and retain all rights, including the worldwide copyright, in the Illius Rock Content and the Service solely and exclusively, for the duration of the rights in each country, in all languages, and throughout the universe. You agree that you shall not use the Illius Rock Content in any way whatsoever except per your use of the Service in compliance with the terms of this Agreement. You agree not to modify, rent, lease, loan, sell, distribute, or create derivative works based on the Illius Rock Content or the Service, in any manner, and you shall not exploit the Illius Rock Content or the Service in any unauthorized way whatsoever, including but not limited to, by trespass or burdening network capacity.
*Illius Rock Trademarks*. Illius Rock, the Illius Rock logo, and other Illius Rock trademarks, service marks, graphics, and logos used in connection with the Service are trademarks or registered trademarks of Illius Rock, Inc. in the United States and/or other countries. Other trademarks, service marks, graphics, and logos used in connection with the Service may be the trademarks of their respective owners. You are granted no right or license with respect to any of the aforesaid trademarks and any use of such trademarks.
*User Content*. To the extent that you own the rights, including the worldwide copyright, in and to the text, files, images, photos, video, sounds, musical works, works of authorship, or any other materials (collectively, “User Content”) that you post to the Site, you retain those rights solely and exclusively, for the duration of the rights in each country, in all languages, and throughout the universe. By displaying or publishing (“posting”) any User Content on or through the Service, you hereby grant to Illius Rock a limited, non-exclusive license to use, modify, publicly perform, publicly display, reproduce, and distribute such User Content solely on and through the Service. This license will terminate at the time you remove the User Content from the Site.
#### Conditions of Use.
1. Your use of the Site is conditioned upon your prior acceptance of the terms of this Agreement. 2. You agree that you will neither attempt to nor encourage or assist any other person to circumvent or modify any security technology or software that is part of the Site. 3. You shall not access or attempt to access any account that you are not authorized to access. You agree not to attempt to modify and/or to modify the Site in any manner or form, or obtain unauthorized access to the Service. Violations of system or network security may result in civil or criminal liability. 4. You shall not post any User Content or create any Campaign that: 1. is patently offensive; 2. promotes racism, bigotry, hatred or physical harm of any kind against any group or individual; 3. harasses or advocates harassment of another person; 4. contains nudity, violence, or offensive subject matter or contains a link to an adult website; 5. solicits personal information from anyone under 18; 6. promotes information that you know is false or misleading or promotes illegal activities or conduct that is abusive, threatening, obscene, defamatory or libelous; 7. promotes an illegal or unauthorized copy of another person's copyrighted work, such as providing pirated computer programs or links to them, providing information to circumvent manufacture-installed copy-protect devices, or providing pirated music or links to pirated music files; 8. involves the transmission of “junk mail,” “chain letters,” or unsolicited mass mailing, instant messaging, “spimming,” or “spamming”; 9. contains restricted or password only access pages or hidden pages or images (those not linked to or from another accessible page); 10. furthers or promotes any criminal activity or enterprise or provides instructional information about illegal activities including, but not limited to making or buying illegal weapons, violating someone's privacy, or providing or creating computer viruses; 11. solicits passwords or personal identifying information for commercial or unlawful purposes from other Users; 12. involves commercial activities and/or sales without Illius Rock’s prior written consent such as contests, sweepstakes, barter, advertising, or pyramid schemes; or, 13. includes a photograph of another person that you have posted without that person's consent. 5. You are entirely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your Registration Information. You agree not to use the account, user name, or password of another Member at any time or to disclose your password to any third party. You agree to notify Illius Rock in writing immediately if you suspect any unauthorized use of or access to your account. You are solely responsible for any and all use of your account. 6. Illius Rock reserves the right to review materials posted to the Site and to remove any materials in its sole discretion without notice or liability. 7. Illius Rock has the right, but not the obligation, to monitor any information and materials submitted or posted by you or otherwise available on the Service, to investigate any reported or apparent violation of this Agreement, and to take any action that Illius Rock in its sole discretion deems appropriate. 8. Illius Rock reserves the right to terminate your access to the Site at any time without notice for any reason whatsoever.
#### Agreement to Pay.
*Payment for Contributions*. You agree to pay for all Contributions you make through the Service, and that Illius Rock may charge your credit card account or your PayPal account for any Contributions you make. You are responsible for the timely payment of all fees and for providing Illius Rock with valid credit card or PayPal account information. All fees will be billed to the credit card or PayPal account that you designate during the registration process. If you want to designate a different credit card or if there is a change in your credit card or PayPal account status, you must change your credit card or PayPal account information online at the Account Information section of the Service.
*Electronic Signatures and Contracts*. Your use of the Service includes the ability to enter into agreements and/or to make Contributions electronically. You acknowledge that your electronic submissions constitute your agreement and intent to pay for such Contributions. Your agreement and intent to be bound by electronic submissions applies to all records relating to all transactions you enter into on the Site, including notices of cancellation, policies, contracts, and applications.
**Copyright Policy**. You may not post, modify, distribute, or reproduce in any way any copyrighted material, trademarks, or other proprietary information belonging to others without obtaining the prior written consent of the owner of such proprietary rights. It is the policy of Illius Rock to terminate Membership privileges of any Member who repeatedly infringes the copyright rights of others upon receipt of prompt notification to Illius Rock by the copyright owner or the copyright owner’s legal agent. Without limiting the foregoing, if you believe that your work has been copied and posted on the Site in a way that constitutes copyright infringement, please provide Illius Rock with the following information: (i) an electronic or physical signature of the person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright interest; (ii) a description of the copyrighted work that you claim has been infringed; (iii) a description of where the material that you claim is infringing is located on the Site; (iv) your address, telephone number, and email address; (v) a written statement by you that you have a good faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law; (vi) a statement by you, made under penalty of perjury, that the above information in your notice is accurate and that you are the copyright owner or authorized to act on the copyright owner's behalf. Illius Rock’s agent for notice of claims of copyright infringement can be reached as follows: Copyright Agent, Illius Rock, Inc., **Kabir Hemrajani**; telephone: **617-888-4930**; Attn: Copyright Agent; and email: **copyright@illiusrock.com**.
**Privacy**. Use of the Site is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into this Agreement by this reference.
**Disclaimers**. Illius Rock is not responsible for any actions or inactions on the part of any User. Illius Rock is not involved in, maintains no control over, and does not guarantee the quality, safety or legality of goods or services offered in return for Contributions, the truth or accuracy of Campaigns, or the ability of Users to fulfill their obligations. Illius Rock is not responsible for any incorrect or inaccurate material posted on the Site or in connection with the Service, whether caused by Users or by any of the equipment or programming associated with or utilized in the Site.
The Site may contain links to third party websites. You acknowledge and agree that Illius Rock is not responsible for the content of, or the accuracy or opinions expressed on such websites, and such websites are in no way investigated, monitored or checked for accuracy or completeness by Illius Rock. Inclusion of any linked website on the Site does not imply approval or endorsement of the linked website by Illius Rock. When you access these third-party sites, you do so at your own risk. Illius Rock is not responsible for the conduct, whether online or offline, of any User of the Site.
Illius Rock assumes no responsibility for any error, omission, interruption, deletion, defect, delay in operation or transmission, communications line failure, theft or destruction or unauthorized access to, or alteration of, any User or Member communication. Illius Rock is not responsible for any problems or technical malfunction of any telephone network or lines, computer online systems, servers or providers, computer equipment, software, failure of any email or players due to technical problems or traffic congestion on the Internet or on the Site or combination thereof, including any injury or damage to Users or to any person’s computer related to or resulting from participation or downloading materials in connection with the Site.
Under no circumstances will Illius Rock be responsible for any loss or damage, including personal injury or death, resulting from use of the Site or the Service, from any content posted on or through the Site, or from the conduct of any Users of the Site, whether online or offline. The Site is provided “AS-IS” and as available and Illius Rock expressly disclaims any warranty of fitness for a particular purpose or non-infringement. Illius Rock cannot guarantee and does not promise any specific results from use of the Site or the Service.
#### Limitation on Liability.
Illius Rock DOES NOT GUARANTEE, REPRESENT, OR WARRANT THAT YOUR USE OF THE SERVICE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE, AND YOU AGREE THAT FROM TIME TO TIME Illius Rock MAY REMOVE THE SERVICE FOR INDEFINITE PERIODS OF TIME, OR CANCEL THE SERVICE AT ANY TIME, WITHOUT NOTICE TO YOU.
YOU EXPRESSLY AGREE THAT YOUR USE OF, OR INABILITY TO USE, THE SERVICE IS AT YOUR SOLE RISK. THE SERVICE IS (EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY STATED BY Illius Rock) PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" FOR YOUR USE, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING ALL IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, AND NONINFRINGEMENT. BECAUSE SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OF IMPLIED WARRANTIES, THE ABOVE EXCLUSION OF IMPLIED WARRANTIES MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU.

BECAUSE SOME STATES OR JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OR THE LIMITATION OF LIABILITY FOR CONSEQUENTIAL OR INCIDENTAL DAMAGES, IN SUCH STATES OR JURISDICTIONS, Illius Rock’s LIABILITY SHALL BE LIMITED TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW.
Illius Rock SHALL USE REASONABLE EFFORTS TO PROTECT INFORMATION SUBMITTED BY YOU IN CONNECTION WITH THE SERVICE, BUT YOU ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT YOUR SUBMISSION OF SUCH INFORMATION IS AT YOUR SOLE RISK, AND Illius Rock HEREBY DISCLAIMS ANY AND ALL LIABILITY TO YOU FOR ANY LOSS OR LIABILITY RELATING TO SUCH INFORMATION IN ANY WAY.
Illius Rock DOES NOT REPRESENT OR GUARANTEE THAT THE SERVICE WILL BE FREE FROM LOSS, CORRUPTION, ATTACK, VIRUSES, INTERFERENCE, HACKING, OR OTHER SECURITY INTRUSION, AND Illius Rock DISCLAIMS ANY LIABILITY RELATING THERETO. YOU SHALL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR BACKING UP YOUR OWN SYSTEM.
**Waiver and Indemnity**. By using the Service, you agree to indemnify and hold Illius Rock, its directors, officers, employees, affiliates, agents, contractors, licensors, and subsidiaries harmless from any loss, liability, claim, or demand, including reasonable attorneys’ fees, made by any third party due to or arising out of your use of the Service in violation of this Agreement and/or arising from a breach of this Agreement or your violation of any law or the rights of a third party.
If you have a dispute with one or more Users, you release Illius Rock and its directors, offices, employees, affiliates, agents, contractors, licensors, and subsidiaries from claims, losses, liability, demands or damages (actual and consequential) of every kind and nature, known and unknown, arising out of or in any way connected with such disputes.
**Governing Law**. The laws of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, USA, without regard to conflict of law provisions, govern this Agreement and your use of the Service. You agree to exclusive personal jurisdiction and venue in the state and federal courts of the United States located in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts for any claim or dispute with Illius Rock or in any way relating to or arising from your use of the Service.
**No Agency**. No agency, partnership, joint venture, employee-employer or franchiser-franchisee relationship is intended or created by this Agreement.
**Other**. These Terms of Use constitute the entire agreement between Illius Rock and you and govern your use of the Service, superseding any prior agreements between Illius Rock and you. You also may be subject to additional terms and conditions that may apply when you use affiliate services, third-party content, or third-party software. If any part of these Terms of Use is held invalid or unenforceable, that portion shall be construed in a manner consistent with applicable law to reflect, as nearly as possible, the original intentions of the parties, and the remaining portions shall remain in full force and effect. Illius Rock’s failure to enforce any right or provisions in these Terms of Use will not constitute a waiver of such provision, or any other provision of these Terms of Use. If any provision of this Agreement is found by a court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid, the other provisions will remain in full force and effect. Illius Rock will not be responsible for failures to fulfill any obligations due to causes beyond its control.
Please contact us at **privacy@illiusrock.com** with any questions regarding this Agreement.
